summary: Complete testing of Name Craft e-commerce new features: Navigation API, Refunds management, WhatsApp settings, and product images. All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tests verified all features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features fully tested: 1) Navigation API at /api/navigation returns dynamic menu items (Women, Men, Couples, Earrings, Personalized, All Products), 2) Refunds admin tab at /admin with CRUD operations, status filters, 3) WhatsApp settings tab in Site Settings with enable/disable toggle, 4) All product images now use Unsplash/Pexels stock photos (no broken images), 5) Products with allow_custom_image=true show photo upload section.

backend_api_tests.navigation_item_structure: PASS - All items have id, name, href
backend_api_tests.admin_create_navigation: PASS - Creates and returns new item
backend_api_tests.admin_get_refunds: PASS - Returns refunds list with total
backend_api_tests.earrings_product_images: PASS - All 11 products have valid Unsplash/Pexels URLs
backend_api_tests.for_her_product_images: PASS - All 17 products have valid image URLs
backend_api_tests.product_custom_image_flag: PASS - Some products allow custom image upload

frontend_ui_tests.earrings_collection_page: PASS - 11 products with valid images displayed
frontend_ui_tests.for_her_collection_page: PASS - 17 products with valid images displayed
frontend_ui_tests.admin_refunds_tab: PASS - Shows status filter, New Refund button, empty state
frontend_ui_tests.admin_navigation_tab: PASS - Shows 6 items with edit/delete actions, Seed Defaults button
frontend_ui_tests.admin_whatsapp_settings: PASS - Shows WhatsApp Business API section with enable toggle
frontend_ui_tests.product_page_custom_upload: PASS - Upload Your Photo section visible for eligible products

features_verified.broken_images_fixed: All product images now load from Unsplash/Pexels stock photos
features_verified.whatsapp_notifications: WhatsApp settings tab available in admin Site Settings with enable/disable toggle
features_verified.refunds_management: Admin Refunds tab with status filters, create/update/delete operations
features_verified.dynamic_navigation: Navigation API endpoint returns menu items, admin can manage via Navigation tab
